summary: Lydia with better looks as a stealthy archer
descriptionHtml:
-Remade lydia to look less ugly and be a stealthy archer
-Wears the guild master armor set
-Prefers bows but has a glass sword 
-Has a glass bow too but refuses to use it for some reason
-I made this using the skyrim npc editor http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4554
-requires ApachiiSkyHair http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

INSTALLATION
-unzip with winrar or 7zip 
-open folder and put both files into \\skyrim\\data\\ folder
-start game and lydia should look different
author: Zeke96
